title: Every Reaction comes with a Reaction
itunes:title: Every Reaction comes with a Reaction
description:
Today on the show it was only right to open up phone lines see what our listeners thought about Will Smith's smack heard around the world at the Oscars! Was Will Smith justified for smacking Chris Rock when it comes to standing up for your wife? or should Will have waited until after the Oscars was over? Moreover, we also open the phone lines to see if any of our listeners lost their temper over their partner like Will Smith did, or in ways like Dj Envy has in the past about his wife.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
